it.unipr.netsec.ipstack.arp

Class ArpInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unipr.netsec.ipstack.net.NetInterface
      • it.unipr.netsec.ipstack.arp.ArpInterface

  • public class ArpInterface
extends NetInterface
    ARP interface for sending and receiving ARP packets through an underling Ethernet interface.
